channel.title: Paragon 464 || HIGH DEFINITION|| Supports multiple modes || New content || REAL
channel.description:
[B]Introduction[/B]
Paragon is a high quality #464 server emulator inspired by BattleScape, brought to you by a group of RuneScape/RSPS veterans, the contributors/creators of 2006Scape, RuneLegends and Resolution.
Paragon is based off of the server framework Hyperion by Graham Edgecombe, allowing for a stable server capable of handling thousands of players online at once. We plan on making Paragon a highly enjoyable environment with near perfect emulation of many of the official RuneScape features, along with fun and unique custom content, such as our multiplayer zombie defense minigame. We recognize that there are many different types of players; we have the completionists, the PvPers, and the skillers.
We've attempted to make the server enjoyable for all crowds by having high quality combat, skilling and a large amount of optional mini-quests. We haven't forgotten the clan communities and have some special features planned in the future for them too.
[B]Developers:[/B] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/nas/]Nas[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/Nando/]Nando[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/Leanbow]Leanbow[/url] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/members/Tyrone+Chicken/]Tyrone Chicken[/url]
[B]Media 602 Mode:[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NBKKlFb.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WoQ43HH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eH2mQ0I.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ec3HnHO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zvUMXn7.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gkAUHMs.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EkQV8qN.png[/img]
[B]Media 464 Mode:[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aorSb5E.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7sajCmr.png[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ttawljl.png[/img]

item.title: Paragon 464 || HIGH DEFINITION|| Supports multiple modes || New content || REAL
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:25, topic:532657”][quote author=Tyrone Chicken link=topic=651449.msg4373192#msg4373192 date=1381343486]

unless he’s using an actual 464 cache + deob + server protocol, without loading lower/higher content that isn’t in there by default - then it’s not real.

so because hes cache packing models and making custom interfaces in the 464 cache its not real? wut rofl?
[/quote]this is like saying deathlypvpz is a 600+ server.

How is it like saying Deathlypvpz is a 600+? We’re not claiming its anything higher than what it is. This is a 464 packed with higher revision content, just as Deathlypvpz is a 317 packed with higher revision content.

But why not use an actual 600+ client?[/quote]
What I’ve been saying for a year by now…

Rip Nando!

OT: Good luck I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: Paragon 464 || HIGH DEFINITION|| Supports multiple modes || New content || REAL
item.dc:creator: @Tyrone_Chicken Tyrone Chicken
item.description:
@Tyrone_Chicken wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:25, topic:532657”][quote author=Tyrone Chicken link=topic=651449.msg4373192#msg4373192 date=1381343486]

unless he’s using an actual 464 cache + deob + server protocol, without loading lower/higher content that isn’t in there by default - then it’s not real.

so because hes cache packing models and making custom interfaces in the 464 cache its not real? wut rofl?
[/quote]this is like saying deathlypvpz is a 600+ server.

How is it like saying Deathlypvpz is a 600+? We’re not claiming its anything higher than what it is. This is a 464 packed with higher revision content, just as Deathlypvpz is a 317 packed with higher revision content.

But why not use an actual 600+ client?[/quote]
Because we slowly turned it into this, it wasn’t a thing where we decided “Hey, let’s go and cram 300mb+ into the 464 cache!”. It went from a stock 464 and slowly moved to where it is now.

Read full topic

item.title: Paragon 464 || HIGH DEFINITION|| Supports multiple modes || New content || REAL
item.dc:creator: @Wizard_jesse Wizard jesse
item.description:
@Wizard_jesse wrote:

Vain_:

its not a real any_revision if you hardcode the hell out of higher or lower revision content.

Its really a 464 since leanbow was showing me all the cache work he was putting into it. Also I doubt all of it is hardcoded. Also not sure what your term of hardcode means lol

Real 464 packets lold

It doesn’t really matter that you used Hyperion, you’ve still ended up producing work that looks like those crappy PI bases that load 600+ stuff.

There’s nothing wrong with packing newer models and etc… into the cache at least its not a 317 also mostly people that play rsps want all this new stuff anyway

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Tyrone_Chicken Tyrone Chicken
item.description:
@Tyrone_Chicken wrote:

AtomicInt_:

You could prove it. By posting the protocol or some other significance of proof.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sm_yLqIY6Nk[/youtube]

Vain_:

why have a background for login but not for game mode? keep one layout

I’m not sure what you meant due to the way you’ve worded it, but I’m going to guess you’re talking about how it’s black & white on one and in full colour on the other; the reason it’s black and white is because it was meant to go along with the effect of loading (starting black and white and then loading into full colour, but anyway it’s probably going to be changed).

Strucker:

man i hate that hp bar, but other than that looking good

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d_IEc0JyUKk[/youtube]

Read full topic
